convo: Hello, I am Jack. Your trusty law consulator.
I want to make sure that you are well equipt and in good legal health so that you can be properlly protected
Essential legal information you should always know is..
click on the subject you wish to talk in detail about
sub_titles: Creating a will and planning for unplanned circumstances...

sub_stories.title: will
convo: Lets begin with you're will. Would you like to make one?
good: That is a wise decision. By having a will you can ensure that you assets are distributed the way you wish after death.

consequence.name: Died
consequence.good_prompt: You were hit by a car and died shorty afterwards. On the bright side you were smart enough to make a will so all you assets were taken care of.
consequence.bad_prompt: You were hit by a car and died shorty afterwards. To make matters worse you did not have a will so your assets were misappropriated. Should have lawyered up.
